definitions: The giving of something to someone, especially as part of a formal ceremony.
The manner or style in which something is given, offered, or displayed.
A speech or talk in which a new product, idea, or piece of work is shown and explained to an audience.
A formal introduction of someone, especially at court.
The action or right of formally proposing a candidate for a Church benefice or other position.
The position of a fetus in relation to the cervix at the time of delivery.
The coming forward of a patient for initial examination and diagnosis.
The manner in which a disease initially manifests itself.
